18 #ifndef GANDIVA_EPOCH_TIME_POINT_H
19 #define GANDIVA_EPOCH_TIME_POINT_H
20 
21 // TODO(wesm): IR compilation does not have any include directories set
22 #include "./date.h"
23 
24 // A point of time measured in millis since epoch.
25 class EpochTimePoint {
26  public:
27  explicit EpochTimePoint(std::chrono::milliseconds millis_since_epoch)
28  : tp_(millis_since_epoch) {}
29 
30  explicit EpochTimePoint(int64_t millis_since_epoch)
31  : EpochTimePoint(std::chrono::milliseconds(millis_since_epoch)) {}
32 
33  int TmYear() const { return static_cast<int>(YearMonthDay().year()) - 1900; }
34 
35  int TmMon() const { return static_cast<unsigned int>(YearMonthDay().month()) - 1; }
36 
37  int TmYday() const {
38  auto to_days = date::floor<date::days>(tp_);
39  auto first_day_in_year = date::sys_days{YearMonthDay().year() / date::jan / 1};
40  return (to_days - first_day_in_year).count();
41  }
42 
43  int TmMday() const { return static_cast<unsigned int>(YearMonthDay().day()); }
44 
45  int TmWday() const {
46  auto to_days = date::floor<date::days>(tp_);
47  return (date::weekday{to_days} - date::Sunday).count(); // NOLINT
48  }
49 
50  int TmHour() const { return static_cast<int>(TimeOfDay().hours().count()); }
51 
52  int TmMin() const { return static_cast<int>(TimeOfDay().minutes().count()); }
53 
54  int TmSec() const {
55  // TODO(wesm): UNIX y2k issue on int=int32 platforms
56  return static_cast<int>(TimeOfDay().seconds().count());
57  }
58 
59  EpochTimePoint AddYears(int num_years) const {
60  auto ymd = YearMonthDay() + date::years(num_years);
61  return EpochTimePoint((date::sys_days{ymd} + // NOLINT
62  TimeOfDay().to_duration())
63  .time_since_epoch());
64  }
65 
66  EpochTimePoint AddMonths(int num_months) const {
67  auto ymd = YearMonthDay() + date::months(num_months);
68  return EpochTimePoint((date::sys_days{ymd} + // NOLINT
69  TimeOfDay().to_duration())
70  .time_since_epoch());
71  }
72 
73  EpochTimePoint AddDays(int num_days) const {
74  auto days_since_epoch = date::sys_days{YearMonthDay()} // NOLINT
75  + date::days(num_days);
76  return EpochTimePoint(
77  (days_since_epoch + TimeOfDay().to_duration()).time_since_epoch());
78  }
79 
80  EpochTimePoint ClearTimeOfDay() const {
81  return EpochTimePoint((tp_ - TimeOfDay().to_duration()).time_since_epoch());
82  }
83 
84  bool operator==(const EpochTimePoint& other) const { return tp_ == other.tp_; }
85 
86  int64_t MillisSinceEpoch() const { return tp_.time_since_epoch().count(); }
87 
88  private:
89  date::year_month_day YearMonthDay() const {
90  return date::year_month_day{date::floor<date::days>(tp_)}; // NOLINT
91  }
92 
93  date::time_of_day<std::chrono::milliseconds> TimeOfDay() const {
94  auto millis_since_midnight = tp_ - date::floor<date::days>(tp_);
95  return date::time_of_day<std::chrono::milliseconds>(millis_since_midnight);
96  }
97 
98  std::chrono::time_point<std::chrono::system_clock, std::chrono::milliseconds> tp_;
99 };
100 
101 #endif // GANDIVA_EPOCH_TIME_POINT_H
